feature: SPACE PUSH - 3D Multiplayer Zero Gravity Arena
description: 40-player 3D browser game where astronauts push each other off a floating platform in space

stories.title: Initialize project with package.json and dependencies
criteria: package.json exists with project name space-push-game
Dependencies include: express, socket.io, three, @react-three/fiber, @react-three/drei, cannon-es

stories.title: Create Express server with Socket.io
criteria: Serves static files from public folder

stories.title: Create React frontend scaffold with Vite
Set up Three.js scene with space background
Create glowing neon platform
criteria: Hexagonal or circular platform mesh exists
Platform has glowing neon edge effect
Platform floats in center of scene
Platform has grid or hex pattern texture
Platform is visible from camera angle

stories.title: Create astronaut player model
criteria: Player represented as glowing sphere or capsule
Multiple players can render with different colors
Player model is visually distinct against space background

stories.title: Implement player movement with arrow keys
Implement boost/dash mechanic with spacebar
criteria: Spacebar triggers boost in current direction
Visual effect on boost (flame trail or burst)

stories.title: Add physics with collision and momentum
criteria: Players collide and push each other

stories.title: Implement WebSocket player synchronization
criteria: Player positions sync across all clients
New players appear for existing players
Server is authoritative for game state

stories.title: Create join screen with name input
criteria: Name is sent to server on join

stories.title: Create lobby waiting room
criteria: Lobby shows all joined player names
Message shows: Waiting for host to start

stories.title: First player becomes host with game controls
criteria: First player to join is automatically designated as host
Host sees START GAME button in lobby
Regular players see 'Waiting for host to start' message
If host disconnects, next player becomes new host
Host indicator shown (crown icon or 'HOST' label)

stories.title: Implement game state management
criteria: Game states: lobby, countdown, playing, ended
State transitions broadcast to all clients
UI updates based on current state
Players can only move during playing state

stories.title: Implement platform shrinking mechanic
criteria: Warning visual before shrink (edge glows red)
Physics boundary updates with platform size
At least 3 shrink stages before minimum size

stories.title: Implement elimination detection
criteria: Player falling below platform triggers elimination
Eliminated player sees Game Over screen

stories.title: Create victory screen
criteria: Victory screen shows when 1 player remains

stories.title: Implement secret Konami code
criteria: Konami sequence: UP UP DOWN DOWN LEFT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT SPACE ENTER
Special victory message: ALL HAIL THE KING
Code only works during playing state

stories.title: Add mobile touch controls
criteria: Works on iOS and Android browsers
